name: textView(_:shouldInteractWith:in:interaction:)
desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified text view allows the specified type of user interaction with the provided text attachment in the specified range of text.
declaration:
optional func textView(_ textView: UITextView, 
    shouldInteractWith textAttachment: NSTextAttachment, 
                    in characterRange: NSRange, 
           interaction: UITextItemInteraction) -> Bool
